title: Pluralsight - Unity VR Locomotion Fundamentals 2018
description: WATCH ONLINE and get more updates and new courses on http://Online-Courses.Club Title: Unity VR Locomotion Fundamentals Publisher: Pluralsight Release: 2018 Website: https://www.pluralsight.com/courses/unity-vr-locomotion-fundamentals Author: Harrison Ferrone Duration: 01 h 04 m Skill Level: Description: Movement in virtual reality can be a tricky proposition, even for seasoned software developers. In this course, Unity VR Locomotion Fundamentals, you’ll learn how to let your users explore their virtual environments in comfort. First, you’ll set up a VR compatible starter project with Google Cardboard and integrate head movement and user input to move around the environment. Next, you’ll explore different teleportation techniques and finish off by implementing passive player movement. By the end of this course, you'll have implemented several VR locomotion techniques in Unity, and acquired the skills needed to continue on into more complex VR projects. Software required: Unity, Visual Studio
